streamName.title: AWS Kinesis Stream Name
streamName.description: Name of the AWS Kinesis stream.

regionName.title: AWS region name
regionName.description: AWS Region where the Kinesis stream is hosted.

awsAccessKeyId.title: AWS Access Key Id
awsAccessKeyId.description: Access key for IAM account with privileges to write to the Kinesis stream.

awsSecretAccessKey.title: AWS Secret Access Key
awsSecretAccessKey.description: Secret key for IAM account with privileges to write to the Kinesis stream.
